title: Tentacles In The Pool
description: Gay tentacle erotica beyond your filthiest dreams...  Bryan has never been lucky, until the day he wins a free pool installation for his backyard. He thinks all his dreams have come true when he finds the pool is home to a horny tentacle monster that lives to pleasure him... After all, Bryan never actually entered the competition, and now his neighbors are acting strangely...  A graphic, erotic tale of hot gay sex that's out of this world...
author: Jaime Vincent
